sourcing.instructions:

 Sc (Scandium): Purchase from rare earth metal suppliers. 
 Si (Silicon): Available from chemical supply companies. 
 Tb (Terbium): Source from rare earth suppliers. 
 Y (Yttrium): Obtain from rare earth metal suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
